License

hexonet.apiconnector is licensed under MIT License. A short, permissive software license. Basically, you can do whatever you want as long as you include the original copyright and license notice in any copy of the software/source.

The full license text can be found below (MIT License).

Authors

⚠ This document only reflects the responsible developers at HEXONET GmbH. For a list of MUCH-APPRECIATED CONTRIBUTORS – people who helped developing and extending this library, applying patches, adding helpful comments and thus generally made it that much better, see GitHub’s list of contributors.

  • Kai Schwarz - Development Lead

General License Definitions

The following section contains the full license texts for this module and the documentation.

  • “AUTHORS” hereby refers to all the authors listed in the Authors section.

  • The “MIT License” applies to all the source code shipped as part of hexonet.apiconnector (the module itself as well as the examples and the unittests) as well as documentation.
